title: The original chart instance in report design handle is not modified after running the report.
OB: The original chart instance in the report design handle is not modified after running the report. In my application, I retrieve the design time instance of the chart and then call a method to run the report. However, the chart is not bound with data after running the report. This used to work correctly up until BIRT2.0M3, but it is not working as expected in BIRT RC and 2.0 version.
EB: The chart should be updated with the data after running the report, as it was working in BIRT 2.0M3.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Retrieve the design time instance of the chart in the report. 2. Call the method to run the report. 3. Observe that the chart is not updated with the data.
